Articles.Content:
I've recently created another install specifically for my BDA fighters. I want it to be similar in construct to Ace Combat: Shattered Skies for my PS2, and it would allow you to throttle up and down easily, so I would like it if someone could write a plugin to automatically lock throttle to 75% and when I press the (shift) throttle up button it will increase it to 100% but only as I press the button. Once released it should return to 75% throttle.

Not a coder, cool mod idea for making my BDA experience more enjoyable. Thanks for anyone who tries.
I still have that game and I still play it... I thought I was the only one!

1 minute ago, adsii1970 said:

I still have that game and I still play it... I thought I was the only one!

It's an amazing game  . I tried one of the newer games and it just doesn't feel the same. Still working on buying all the aircraft oddly enough  . Takes a LOT of playthroughs.

I've played Ace Combat: Skies of Deception on PSP and the other one on PSP. Those felt epic, to me.

AC: Assault Horizon was not that great, though. It felt like the CoD version of Ace Combat, what with a "Hurt and Heal" system. I still need to beat it, but at this rate, I am not being very amused with the helicopter combat, both as pilot and gunner.

 

Anyway, a mod like this would be nice. It would be nice though if it had another function, to maintain a certain speed. All too many times have I made a jet that would burn itself to pieces in flight.
